thread.section_title: Washington Square Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Charming
thread.title_full: Charming - Review of Washington Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah H
title: Charming
text:
A small hotel full of charm and character, and neat and pleasant as well. The staff was helpful. The coffee maker was supplied with black and herbal tea as well as coffee, which I appreciated. I enjoyed strolling in Washington Square Park, just outside.
Room Tip: The less expensive rooms are actualy quieter as they do not face the street, and are perfectly pleas... See more room tips
